title: Strengthening Software Development Practice Competencies: Language-Based Pre-Assessment and Feedback Strategies Using MOOCs

context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners will diagnose their language proficiency levels via pre-assessments and create personalized learning plans.
Learners will experience three types of pre-assessment systems (no feedback/basic feedback/detailed feedback) and compare/analyze effective feedback methods.
Learners will achieve an average improvement of over 15% in language proficiency across pre-assessment groups upon course completion.
Learners will observe changes in learning persistence based on feedback types and develop self-directed learning strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
